Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.

Generation VIII.Sword: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan. *
Generation VIII.Shield: Centrifugal force is behind the punches of Melmetal's heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon. *

Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: Transfer from Pokémon GO to GO Park (International version) Trade locally from international version of Let's Go Pikachu or Eevee ( Mainland Chinese version)
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Transfer from Pokémon GO to GO Park (International version) Trade locally from international version of Let's Go Pikachu or Eevee ( Mainland Chinese version)
